name: AI Girlfriend Bot
tagline: AI-powered NSFW chatbot with customizable personality and roleplay
description: AI Girlfriend Bot is a popular Telegram bot that uses AI language models to simulate romantic and NSFW conversations. Users can customize their AI girlfriend's personality, appearance description, and conversation style. The bot supports roleplay scenarios, remembers conversation context, and can generate NSFW text responses. It has become one of the most-used NSFW bots on Telegram.
